A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: kinda feels like the Lost TV show. lots of buildup to not much of anything. All the mysteries and setups from Force Awakens are a total letdown. apparently they did it on purpose to claim some sort of artsy idea of defying expectations\, which is more LIKELY a fancy industry term for\, having no idea how to write an interesting conclusion for those set ups so lets try and squeeze some really weak humor out of them. \nReally stupid leaders on both side making really stupid decisions makes you wonder how anybody follows any of them. \nCritic rating of 91% suggests that they were really hoping for a let down of a movie and got exactly what they wanted.
